resources.string: During the recording, you can track a specified object by drawing a circle on the screen and double tap to stop it
The size of the video has been up to the limit.
The count of continuous shot has been up to the limit.
Video cannot be recorded in the current state
Mic is in use and cannot be recorded
The size of the video has been down to the limit.
Do not move the phone while capturing.
Please move Phone(1) steadily along the centre line
Press the shutter and align the circle with the dot, the super panorama mode is more suitable for shooting night scenes
Keep the arrow on the line
Move phone (1) to align the circle with the dot
Press shutter button and move your phone \n slowly in one direction
Tap the arrow to change capture directions
Align the arrow with the reference line
Please use Panorama in portrait mode
Click on add to the shortcut bar or \n drag to add the shortcut
You can change permissions in Settings > Apps > %1$s > Permissions
SD card storage is full. Save to internal storage.
Save file to SD card failed. Save to internal storage.
Internal storage is full. Save to SD card storage.
Phone storage space is full. Please clean up to free space
Please unlock your phone first in order to accept/refuse permission request
Tap on the icon to open Telephoto mode
Tap on the icon to activate group selfie
Your system is in low memory, some features limit capture size
Capture more details on picture with Super Pixel
Look at the lens for better selfies
Shoot subjects within 2 metres for best results

Cannot record sound during a call
Switch to ultra-wide angle to catch even more landscape or friends.
View your settings and allow access to \"DCIM\" in \"SD card\"
Shoot subjects at 4cm for best results
Temperature is too high. Cannot open torch.
Temperature is too high; the camera will be stopped after 5 seconds.
This special type allows you to edit bokeh effect.
